title-group.article-title: Zeugnis und Zeugen Selbstverständnis und Ausblicke einer reflexiven Ethnologie

abstract.p: The impact of modernity, the recognition of which was central to ethnographic testimony, has been challenged by self-referential cultural criticism. A growing awareness of cultural representations has been advocated within the frame of narrative ethnology. This shift towards understanding and interpretation is pointing not only to an ethnographic dialogue, as it has been suggested, but also to cultural relativism. Furthermore, as a result of conflicting interpretations, there has been a tendency to overemphasize the diversity of cultural identities. Instead of hallowing relativistic claims for "readability," more realistic attempts have to be made towards complex situations facing the intricacies of contemporean modern life.

p.mixed-citation: Leben in den Kategorien einer anderen" (1990: 139).
Worten Greenblatts: „das hartnäckige, unvereinnehmbare Anderssein, das Gefühl der Distanz und Differenz" (1991: 13),
